intro.description: We don't publish client logos or fabricated testimonials. Instead, here are detailed simulations showing how we approach common challenges. These demonstrate our methodology without compromising client confidentiality.

cases.title: Plumbing Company: Local Visibility Overhaul
cases.challenge: Family-owned plumbing business invisible in Google Maps despite 15 years of operation. Losing jobs to newer competitors with better online presence. GBP incomplete, no citation strategy, inconsistent NAP data.
cases.approach: Full local visibility audit revealed 23 citation inconsistencies, missing service categories, and zero review strategy. Rebuilt GBP from ground up, established citation consistency across 40+ directories, implemented review request automation.
cases.disclaimer: Simulated case based on common patterns. Actual client results vary based on market conditions, competition, and engagement level.

cases.title: Dental Clinic: Website Conversion Redesign
cases.challenge: Modern clinic with outdated website. High traffic from ads but 0.8% conversion rate. Slow load times, confusing navigation, no mobile optimization. Losing potential patients at the website stage.
cases.approach: Conversion audit identified 14 friction points. Redesigned with clear service pages, prominent booking CTAs, trust signals, and Core Web Vitals optimization. Implemented appointment booking flow with 3-step conversion path.
outcomes: 42% reduction in ad spend for same leads
cases.disclaimer: Simulated case based on common patterns. Actual client results vary based on market conditions, competition, and engagement level.

cases.title: Marketing Agency: Operations Automation
cases.challenge: Growing agency spending 25+ hours weekly on administrative tasks. Manual reporting, scattered client communication, no standardized onboarding. Team stretched thin, error-prone processes.
cases.approach: Mapped all workflows and identified 12 automation opportunities. Implemented client onboarding automation, weekly report generation, invoice creation, and Slack-based project updates. Connected CRM, project management, and accounting systems.
cases.disclaimer: Simulated case based on common patterns. Actual client results vary based on market conditions, competition, and engagement level.
